---
title: "ERCOT Settlement Price Cleaning"
output: html_notebook
---

This notebook is for cleaning and processing ERCOT settlement prices for electricity

```{r}
#clean workspace
rm(list = ls())
```


```{r}
library(readxl)

```


```{r}
# Import 2010 prices. Only December figures are available; I figure they only keep ten years of data available...
spot_prices_DAM_dec_2010 <- read_excel("data/ERCOT_prices_historic/rpt.00013060.0000000000000000.DAMLZHBSPP_2010.xlsx")
```
